title: New: The Pale White – Downer
body:
Photo: Daniel Stark

Despite having now made the move to London, there will always be a special place in my heart for Newcastle.

With a thriving music scene unlike any there for the past decade or so, and raucous trio **The Pale White** leading the charge, it’s a truly exciting time for the north east. Their latest single, _Downer_, is an ode to the infamous drinking culture found in Newcastle, specifically nights spent in Gotham, the most gloriously unique of bars. Check it out below.
